Texts.Eng: It should be noted that bees have a natural predator: ^orange;Mites^reset;. These parasites infest your apiaries from time to time, and reduce their productivity and can even kill the bees. Create an ^orange;anti-mite frame^reset; to combat them.

Simply placing this in an apiary will work its magic. ^orange;Mites hate these things^reset; and will be killed or driven off by them. Keep some handy. That's all I can teach you, it's up to you to experiment and breed the best bees you can! Bee all you can bee!
